title: When is the hole or severe depression in the road at the intersection of Market & Kerr going to to repaired? It is in the right lane headed north on Market just as you pass Kerr.
text: Hello. Here's the answer to your question. The location was patched on Aug. 19, said Jason A. Rivenbark, assistant resident engineer of the Wilmington Resident EngineerÍs Office, Division 3, N.C. Department of Transportation.
